# acyRsa

## Overview

This package lets you access ACyRSA's API using R. Having this will enable to integrate ACyRSA's data more easily into R workflows.

## Installation

At the moment `acyRsa` is only available through GitHub usind `devtools`.

#### Installing with `devtools`

1. In R install the package `devtools`.

```{r, eval=FALSE}
install.packages("devtools")
```

2. Once `devtools` is installed.

```{r, eval=FALSE}
library(devtools)
devtools::install_github("augustohassel/acyRsa")
```
